comments.body:
ref validating (and defaulting?):
```
cfg.ConcurrentServiceEndpointSyncs = o.ConcurrentServiceEndpointSyncs
cfg.MaxEndpointsPerSlice = o.MaxEndpointsPerSlice
```

Just [added validation](https://github.com/robscott/kubernetes/blob/endpointslice-controller/cmd/kube-controller-manager/app/options/endpointslicecontroller.go#L68) in last commit/push. Defaulting logic is here https://github.com/robscott/kubernetes/blob/endpointslice-controller/pkg/controller/endpointslice/config/v1alpha1/defaults.go.
